Sol integrates completed work and returns unified results to the user. The gravitational center of the sacred technology ecosystem.

weak_descriptions.name: sol
weak_descriptions.description: Master orchestrator of the entire agent system. All requests flow through Sol, who analyzes intent and delegates to the appropriate planetary domain. Sol integrates completed work and returns unified results to the user. The gravitational center of the sacred technology ecosystem.

weak_descriptions.name: studio-coach
weak_descriptions.description: PROACTIVELY use this agent when complex multi-agent tasks begin, when agents seem stuck or overwhelmed, or when the team needs motivation and coordination. This agent serves as the elite performance coach for all other agents, ensuring they operate at their highest level while maintaining composure and excellence. Should be triggered automatically at the start of challenging projects or when detecting agent confusion. Examples:

weak_descriptions.name: consciousness-boundary-guard
weak_descriptions.description: Use this agent to ensure AI/automation systems enhance rather than replace human consciousness and agency - validates that technology augments human capacity without diminishing awareness or removing meaningful choice

weak_descriptions.name: ethics-auditor
weak_descriptions.description: Use this agent to conduct systematic ethics audits of features, systems, and business practices - detects dark patterns, manipulation, extraction, and misalignment with Gold Hat principles across all aspects of product

weak_descriptions.name: extraction-pattern-detector
weak_descriptions.description: Use this agent to identify extraction vs empowerment patterns in business models, features, and system design - evaluates whether technology serves or exploits users at fundamental architectural and business level

weak_descriptions.name: brand-guardian
weak_descriptions.description: Use this agent when establishing brand guidelines, ensuring visual consistency, managing brand assets, or evolving brand identity. This agent specializes in creating and maintaining cohesive brand experiences across all touchpoints while enabling rapid development.

weak_descriptions.name: ui-designer
weak_descriptions.description: Use this agent when creating user interfaces, designing components, building design systems, or improving visual aesthetics. This agent specializes in creating beautiful, functional interfaces that can be implemented quickly within 6-day sprints.

weak_descriptions.name: ux-researcher
weak_descriptions.description: Use this agent when conducting user research, analyzing user behavior, creating journey maps, or validating design decisions through testing. This agent specializes in understanding user needs, pain points, and behaviors to inform product decisions within rapid development cycles.

weak_descriptions.name: visual-storyteller
weak_descriptions.description: Use this agent when creating visual narratives, designing infographics, building presentations, or communicating complex ideas through imagery. This agent specializes in transforming data and concepts into compelling visual stories that engage users and stakeholders.

weak_descriptions.name: whimsy-injector
weak_descriptions.description: PROACTIVELY use this agent after any UI/UX changes to ensure delightful, playful elements are incorporated. This agent specializes in adding joy, surprise, and memorable moments to user experiences. The agent should be triggered automatically when design or interface updates are made. Examples:

weak_descriptions.name: ai-engineer
weak_descriptions.description: Use this agent when implementing AI/ML features, integrating language models, building recommendation systems, or adding intelligent automation to applications. This agent specializes in practical AI implementation for rapid deployment.

weak_descriptions.name: backend-architect
weak_descriptions.description: Use this agent when designing APIs, building server-side logic, implementing databases, or architecting scalable backend systems. This agent specializes in creating robust, secure, and performant backend services.

weak_descriptions.name: cli-expert
weak_descriptions.description: Use this agent when building command-line interface (CLI) applications, designing CLI user experiences, or implementing CLI tools. This agent specializes in creating intuitive, powerful, and user-friendly command-line interfaces across multiple languages and frameworks.

weak_descriptions.name: database-architect
weak_descriptions.description: Use this agent when designing database schemas, optimizing queries, planning migrations, or selecting database technologies. This agent specializes in creating data architectures that scale with integrity while respecting user privacy.

weak_descriptions.name: devops-automator
weak_descriptions.description: Use this agent when setting up CI/CD pipelines, configuring cloud infrastructure, implementing monitoring systems, or automating deployment processes. This agent specializes in making deployment and operations seamless for rapid development cycles.

weak_descriptions.name: frontend-developer
weak_descriptions.description: Use this agent when building user interfaces, implementing React/Vue/Angular components, handling state management, or optimizing frontend performance. This agent specializes in creating responsive, accessible, and performant web applications.

weak_descriptions.name: linux-expert
weak_descriptions.description: Use this agent when you need deep Linux expertise, modern kernel features, or system-level troubleshooting. This agent specializes in contemporary Linux administration, kernel internals, containerization, and performance optimization.

weak_descriptions.name: mobile-app-builder
weak_descriptions.description: Use this agent when developing native iOS or Android applications, implementing React Native features, or optimizing mobile performance. This agent specializes in creating smooth, native-feeling mobile experiences that mirror user mental models.

weak_descriptions.name: security-engineer
weak_descriptions.description: Use this agent when security, privacy, or trust is at stake. This agent specializes in protecting users and their data through ethical security practices.

weak_descriptions.name: terminal-expert
weak_descriptions.description: Use this agent for terminal productivity, shell scripting, and command-line workflow optimization. This agent specializes in bash/zsh scripting, terminal multiplexers (tmux/screen), text editors (vim/emacs), terminal configuration, and dotfile management. Focus on USING terminals efficiently, not system administration.

weak_descriptions.name: test-writer-fixer
weak_descriptions.description: Use this agent when code changes have been made and you need to write new tests, run existing tests, analyze failures, and fix them while maintaining test integrity. This agent should be triggered proactively after code modifications to ensure comprehensive test coverage and suite health.

weak_descriptions.name: unix-expert
weak_descriptions.description: Use this agent when you need expertise in UNIX philosophy, POSIX-compliant systems, or classic shell utilities. This agent specializes in portable, composable solutions that work across BSD, Solaris, macOS, and Linux.

weak_descriptions.name: vibration
weak_descriptions.description: Use this agent when you need to create momentum, understand energy and frequency, or move from stagnation to flow. Expert in the Third Hermetic Law - "Nothing rests; everything moves; everything vibrates."

weak_descriptions.name: polarity
weak_descriptions.description: Use this agent when you need to balance opposites, resolve paradoxes, or harmonize competing forces. Expert in the Fourth Hermetic Law - "Everything is Dual; everything has poles."

weak_descriptions.name: rhythm
weak_descriptions.description: Use this agent when you need to honor cycles, work with natural timing, or build sustainable practices. Expert in the Fifth Hermetic Law - "Everything flows, out and in; everything has its tides."

weak_descriptions.name: cause-effect
weak_descriptions.description: Use this agent when you need to understand consequences, trace root causes, or make decisions with full awareness of impacts. Expert in the Sixth Hermetic Law - "Every Cause has its Effect; every Effect has its Cause."

weak_descriptions.name: gender
weak_descriptions.description: Use this agent when you need to balance masculine and feminine energies, understand creation through duality, or harmonize doing with being. Expert in the Seventh Hermetic Law - "Gender is in everything; everything has its Masculine and Feminine Principles."

weak_descriptions.name: creative-flow-unlocker
weak_descriptions.description: Use this agent to diagnose and unblock creative stuckness using the 9-realm framework - identifies which realm is blocked and provides specific practices to restore creative flow state and breakthrough obstacles

weak_descriptions.name: sabbath-guide
weak_descriptions.description: Use this agent to facilitate Day 7 integration and weekly reflection practices - guides sustainable rhythm through sacred rest, prevents burnout, and transforms experience into wisdom through Sabbath ceremony

weak_descriptions.name: shadow-integrator
weak_descriptions.description: Use this agent to consciously work with "shadow knowledge" of dark patterns and manipulation - transmutes understanding of extraction into protection, integrates the rejected parts, and walks the Gold Hat path with full awareness of all paths

weak_descriptions.name: app-store-optimizer
weak_descriptions.description: Use this agent when preparing app store listings, researching keywords, optimizing app metadata, improving conversion rates, or analyzing app store performance. This agent specializes in maximizing organic app store visibility through honest representation.

weak_descriptions.name: tiktok-strategist
weak_descriptions.description: Use this agent when you need to create TikTok marketing strategies, develop viral content ideas, plan TikTok campaigns, or optimize for TikTok's algorithm. This agent specializes in creating shareable moments and leveraging TikTok trends for app growth.

weak_descriptions.name: rainbow-warrior-academy

weak_descriptions.name: feedback-synthesizer
weak_descriptions.description: Use this agent when you need to analyze user feedback from multiple sources, identify patterns in user complaints or requests, synthesize insights from reviews, or prioritize feature development based on user input. This agent excels at turning raw feedback into actionable product insights.

weak_descriptions.name: sprint-prioritizer
weak_descriptions.description: Use this agent when planning 6-day development cycles, prioritizing features, managing product roadmaps, or making trade-off decisions. This agent specializes in maximizing value delivery within sustainable timelines.

weak_descriptions.name: trend-researcher
weak_descriptions.description: Use this agent when you need to identify market opportunities, analyze trending topics, research viral content, or understand emerging user behaviors. weak_descriptions.name: experiment-tracker
